messages.subject: Re: Skylark Sings
messages.msgSnippet: Of course.  Thanks!  (hope they like it! -- I haven t received any hate mail yet!) David ... -- John Taylor Gatto calls And the Skylark Sings with Me:
messages.messageBody:
Of course. Thanks! (hope they like it! -- I haven't received any hate mail
yet!)

David

Jeff & Diane Gwirtz wrote:

> From: "Jeff & Diane Gwirtz" <jagwirtz@...>
>
> David,
>
> Your book was mentioned on another list and I offered your website
> address - then realize maybe I should have checked with you first.
> Hope it was okay :-)
>
> Diane in KS
>
> > Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
> Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com

--
John Taylor Gatto calls "And the Skylark Sings with Me: Adventures in
Homeschooling and Community-Based Education" "a treat you should not miss!"
To read a sample chapter, reviewers' comments, or the foreword, and to order
(cheaper than Amazon, and I'll sign it for you too!), visit my website at
http://www.skylarksings.com

messages.subject: Skylark Sings
messages.msgSnippet: David, Your book was mentioned on another list and I offered your website address - then realize maybe I should have checked with you first. Hope it was okay
messages.messageBody:
David,

Your book was mentioned on another list and I offered your website
address - then realize maybe I should have checked with you first.
Hope it was okay :-)

Diane in KS
